structure.unit: Officers And Employees Of Cities, Towns And Districts

law.catch_line: Policemen And Firemen; Vacations; 20 Yearsâ€™ Service
law.text: In any city or town in which the provisions of section one hundred and eleven D apply and which accepts this section all members of its regular police or fire force may after twenty years of service be granted a vacation of five weeks without loss of pay.
